review: Since the update of 'Hotfix 8.1 Patch' 10/29/2015 around 6:00PM, the game started showing errors and malfunction. It says 'Searching for session' and you will have to wait for 3mins then it will close like no ♥♥♥♥ has happened. This wasn't like this man! I don't like that... When you put the 'REGION OPTION' it started to go wrong... Remove that fu**** option!!! >:(
